tool_description: 🈚 Fetch best quality HD Manga-Anime wallpapers in various categories like Characters, Populars etc.
name: Best Manga Anime Wallpapers
title: Best Manga Anime Wallpapers

api_list.name: Get all sub-categories relavant to specific category
api_list.description:
## About this endpoint
If you want to get filtered response of items which relavant to specific category, you can pass the category name as path paramenter.

Example : For get all wallpapers which in "Popular" category,
Request this endpoint, /categories/popular

/popular is the path parameter in this endpoint. you can pass other categorie's name as that.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://best-manga-anime-wallpapers.p.rapidapi.com/categories/popular"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-manga-anime-wallpapers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://best-manga-anime-wallpapers.p.rapidapi.com/categories/{category_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-manga-anime-wallpapers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Wallpapers
api_list.description:
## About this Endpoint
For get Wallpapers, Pass the slug value sub category (you want to get wallpapers) as the Path parameter,

### Example : to get all wallpapers of Attack on Titan
Request ***/wallpapers/attack-on-titan-hd-wallpapers***
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://best-manga-anime-wallpapers.p.rapidapi.com/wallpapers/attack-on-titan-hd-wallpapers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-manga-anime-wallpapers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://best-manga-anime-wallpapers.p.rapidapi.com/wallpapers/{slug}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-manga-anime-wallpapers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get categories
api_list.description:
## Structure of Response
This response contains array of categories and each one have category name and wallpapers count which relavant to category.

api_list.name: All Popular Anime, Characters, Manga/Anime List
api_list.description:
## Structure of Response
Response contains 3 Arrays of subcategories (Popular, Characters, Anime)

Each JSON Response item contains fields, "thumbnail, title, wallpaper_count, slug, category"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://best-manga-anime-wallpapers.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-manga-anime-wallpapers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
